executiveSummary: Cynthia and John David, the husband-and-wife founders of Life Raft Treats, pitched their novelty ice cream company seeking $250,000 for 5% equity. Their signature product, 'Not Fried Chicken,' is an ice cream treat that resembles fried chicken. Despite impressive sales of $1.2 million last year and strong branding, all Sharks ultimately declined to invest, citing challenges in the frozen food industry and limited marketing strategy.
nextSteps: Cynthia and John plan to continue scaling Life Raft Treats independently, focusing on enhancing their direct-to-consumer operations, revamping their website, and expanding retail partnerships beyond current regional placements.
